about_the_game:
“It is said that her ego has its own country...”

Story


Goblet of Mercy is a short interactive dark fantasy tale about your encounter with a woman whose ego is so big she made her own perfect world to contain it.

It began with Halloween, a time when the veil between worlds is thin. Your friend Judy invited you out to a themed party at the local library. A Halloween event, a good friend, a lot of weird books for sale. Judy might have been in a shifty mood, but there was no need to worry.

Really. What could go wrong?

Features


  • Short (30-45 min, average reading speed)
  • Vampires
  • Certain... details... change in second and third playthroughs
  • 4 Endings
  • Ending variations based on player choices
  • Choices matter
  • Animated hand-painted characters
  • More off the wall at times than scary, with elements of psychological horror
detailed_description:
“It is said that her ego has its own country...”

Story


Goblet of Mercy is a short interactive dark fantasy tale about your encounter with a woman whose ego is so big she made her own perfect world to contain it.

It began with Halloween, a time when the veil between worlds is thin. Your friend Judy invited you out to a themed party at the local library. A Halloween event, a good friend, a lot of weird books for sale. Judy might have been in a shifty mood, but there was no need to worry.

Really. What could go wrong?

Features


  • Short (30-45 min, average reading speed)
  • Vampires
  • Certain... details... change in second and third playthroughs
  • 4 Endings
  • Ending variations based on player choices
  • Choices matter
  • Animated hand-painted characters
  • More off the wall at times than scary, with elements of psychological horror

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: x86_64, i686
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2, or WebGL
  • Storage: 172 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Linux Mint and Ubuntu Studio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2, or WebGL
  • Storage: 172 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please be aware that Mac support is limited.

name: Goblet of Mercy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86_64, i686
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2, or WebGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 172 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A short interactive dark fantasy story in which you meet an egomaniacal empress and must try to survive the encounter through the choices you make.
